channel.title: storm on Tech ramblings by Marcin
channel.description: Recent content in storm on Tech ramblings by Marcin

item.title: Recently at storm-users
item.description: I’ve been reading through storm-users Google Group recently. This resolution was heavily inspired by Adam Kawa’s post “Football zero, Apache Pig hero”. Since I’ve encountered a lot of insightful and very interesting information I’ve decided to describe some of those in this post.
